attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0011: “A” Camshaft Position - Timing Over-Advanced or System Performance Bank 1

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at camshaft (bank 1 / intake side).?

item.ptxt: Difference between measured CMP and targeted CMP is more than specified value for specified time.
Measured CMP does not reach targeted CMP for specified time.
Measured camshaft position is unchanged for specified time.
OCV and/or its circuit
Lubrication system
VVT oil passage
CMP actuator
ECM

ptxt.emph: P0014: “B” Camshaft Position - Timing Over-Advanced or System Performance Bank 1

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at camshaft (bank 1 / exhaust side).

item.ptxt: Difference between measured CMP and targeted CMP is more than specified value for specified time.
Measured CMP does not reach targeted CMP for specified time.
Measured camshaft position is unchanged for specified time.

ptxt.emph: P0021: “A” Camshaft Position - Timing Over-Advanced or System Performance Bank 2

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at camshaft (bank 2 / intake side).

item.ptxt: Difference between measured CMP and targeted CMP is more than specified value for specified time.
Measured CMP does not reach targeted CMP for specified time.
Measured camshaft position is unchanged for specified time.

ptxt.emph: P0024: “B” Camshaft Position - Timing Over-Advanced or System Performance Bank 2

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at camshaft (bank 2 / exhaust side).

item.ptxt: Difference between measured CMP and targeted CMP is more than specified value for specified time.
Measured CMP does not reach targeted CMP for specified time.
Measured camshaft position is unchanged for specified time.
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Accelerate vehicle speed 30 km/h (19 mile/h) to 80 km/h (50 mile/h) within 10 through 20 sec.
Release accelerator pedal, and keep vehicle coasting with engine braking applied (fuel cut condition) until vehicle speed at 30 km/h (19 mile/h).
Check whether EGR and/or VVT system readiness / mounting test has completed using scan tool.
If readiness / mounting test has been incomplete, check vehicle conditions (environmental) and repeat step 2) through 5).

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

test1.ptxt: Check OCV and its circuit related to DTC according to Step 2 through 3 under DTC P0010 / P0013 / P0020 / P0023 / P2088 / P2089 / P2090 / P2091 / P2092 / P2093 / P2094 / P2095:N32A .

item.ptxt: Oil seal: Leakage
Oil passage: Not clogged

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace CMP actuator related to DTC.
Preform DTC confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: DTC P0011, P0014, P0021 or P0024 still detected?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) detected at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
